revised_title: Vertical Floating Collimator and Zenith Telescope Improvements
tldr: James Prinsep describes a new design for a vertical floating collimator, an improvement on the horizontal version. This instrument can be used with various types of telescopes, making it more versatile. The vertical floating collimator can be adapted for use with a zenith telescope, which has advantages over other zenith instruments. The design is supported on a mahogany stand, making it more stable and accurate.
